Santa_Clara.Washburn Preparatory School:
Washburn Preparatory School (1894–1911) was a private preparatory school that was located at 165 Devine Street at the corner of San Pedro Street in San Jose, California.


== History ==
Founded by Jessica Thompson Washburn, one of the first two women to graduate from Stanford University. She opened the school because she was concerned that there wasn't any school in the area to adequately prepared students for study at Stanford University or other elite universities.
